metadata.description: For the first time anywhere, read the untold story of how a young Jax Teller, 18 years old and fresh out of high school, decides to prospect his dead father's—and his current stepfather's—MC, the Sons of Anarchy. The only all-new, original ongoing story for fans of Sons of Anarchy!  Created under complete supervision of SOA show creator Kurt Sutter, the story will feature younger versions of all the characters you've come to know and love, including Opie, Clay, Jemma, Tig, and Chibs!
metadata.name: Sons of Anarchy: Redwood Original
